title: DigIQ Monitor
description: Digital competence monitoring dashboard for Dutch citizens (ages 10-100), featuring 11 dimensions, multilingual support (Dutch/English), and paginated visualizations.
author: Fabio Votta & Ernesto de Le√≥n

title: GSS Data Explorer
description: Interactive sidebar dashboard with cascading radio filters exploring General Social Survey data across demographics.
author: dashboardr team

title: Tutorial Dashboard
description: Includes full code to learn from. Built-in tutorial demonstrating core dashboardr features: bar charts, timelines, and stacked bars.
author: dashboardr team

title: Showcase Dashboard
description: Feature showcase highlighting value boxes, multi-page layouts, themed charts, and advanced content blocks.
author: dashboardr team

title: Interactive Inputs
description: Gallery of interactive input types: select dropdowns, sliders, switches, and checkboxes with live chart filtering.
author: dashboardr team

title: Sidebar Filters
description: Page sidebars with checkbox, dropdown, and slider filters for interactive data exploration.
author: dashboardr team

title: Loading Overlays
description: Animated loading overlays with four themes: light, dark, glass, and accent. Smooth transitions while charts render.
author: dashboardr team

title: Tabset: Pills
description: Rounded pill-shaped tab styling with 1, 2, and 3-level nested tab support.
author: dashboardr team

title: Tabset: Modern
description: Clean contemporary tab styling with subtle backgrounds and smooth transitions.
author: dashboardr team

title: Tabset: Minimal
description: Subtle, understated tab styling with a thin underline indicator for a clean look.
author: dashboardr team

title: Tabset: Classic
description: Traditional bordered tab appearance resembling classic browser-style tabs.
author: dashboardr team

title: Tabset: Underline
description: Bold underline indicator with uppercase labels for a strong, modern look.
author: dashboardr team

title: Tabset: Segmented
description: iOS-style segmented control tabs with a contained, grouped appearance.
author: dashboardr team
